entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Pontiac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 9:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: SW 35 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
